data.description: Introduction to consumer finance covering techniques of personal sector cash flow, asset and liability management, life cycle financial planning, investment management, tax planning, retirement, and estate planning. Analysis and evaluation related to personal financial planning.
data.title: INTRODUCTION TO PERSONAL FINANCIAL PLANNING

data.description: Integrated treatment of macroeconomics and microeconomics (seeECON 101andECON 102). Accelerated approach to economics training, especially for Economics: Math Emphasis majors.
data.title: PRINCIPLES OF ECONOMICS-ACCELERATED TREATMENT

data.description: Application of advanced analytical techniques to examine household financial risk. Implications for financial planning of changes in family structure and earnings. Private and social insurance that guard against economic consequences of death, disability, ill health, retirement, marital dissolution. Use of financial planning software.
data.title: HOUSEHOLD RISK MANAGEMENT

data.description: Economic problems of individuals, firms and industries with emphasis on value, price, and distribution of income.
data.title: PRINCIPLES OF MICROECONOMICS
